## Personal

# Interests
1. Rolling Thunder Martial Arts
Under the tutelage of Dr. John Jory, a 6th Dan Hapkido Martial Artist.
Since 2002, I have trained with John and has since in Association with
Korean Hapkido Federation [HKF Link] (http://www.koreanhapkidofederation.com/)
and Taekwondo and Hapkido Grand Master Sung Soo Lee [GM Link] (https://7tigers-jidokwan.com/html/grand-master-sung-soo-lee.html), John
with his vast Martial Arts Experince, in depth knowledge of human anatomy and
bio-mechanics, musical competency and out of the box thinking, developed 
Rolling Thunder Martial Arts which is a hybrid of numerous arts with a Hapkido
base. [RTMA Link] (https://twitter.com/search?q=%23rollingthundermartialarts&src=typed_query)
